body: Thank you very much, Anton! According to your workflow, it seems that the **Honeybee EP Context Surfaces** component shown below is not connected to the "**HBContext_**" node on the "**Honeybee_Run Energy Simulation**" component. So, will the shading effect of this context surface used to define a PV generator be taken care of by this **Honeybee EP Context Surfaces** component? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FzBIK0EevxBqyAgVi34WfUIUkV1v1tm1SuW8I40O1ZrCaczAXS4dA6Xwfx00ReXIhrjCXQeeEg5iw*NbUDplVHKwUKP2uvtN/01.PNG)
